tribal_communities.name: Santhal
cultural_practices: Traditional dance forms like Chhau and Jhumur
Handicraft making including terracotta and bamboo work

cultural_festivals.description: Harvest festival celebrated by Santhal and other tribes
cultural_festivals.description_hindi: संथाल और अन्य जनजातियों द्वारा मनाया जाने वाला फसल त्योहार
cultural_festivals.visitor_experience: Excellent opportunity to witness tribal culture and traditions

cultural_festivals.name: Karam Festival

cultural_festivals.visitor_experience: Deep cultural immersion in tribal traditions

cultural_festivals.name: Sarhul Festival

cultural_festivals.description_hindi: प्रकृति और नई शुरुआत का जश्न मनाने वाला वसंत त्योहार

local_guides.name: Tribal Culture Specialists
local_guides.specialization: Cultural tours and tribal village visits
local_guides.contact: Local tourism office or community leaders

general_guidelines: Dress modestly, especially in religious places
Remove shoes before entering homes or temples
Learn basic greetings in local languages
festival_participation: Follow local dress codes during festivals
Contribute to community meals if invited
village_visits: Bring small gifts for host families
Learn about local customs before visiting
Support local artisans by purchasing handicrafts
